Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Oakley
ShortDescription: Southbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, North and Milwaukee: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Oakley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, North, Milwaukee and over regular route near Milwaukee/Oakley.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Fullerton
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to police activity.

95th-bound will board/exit via Track 1 on the Brown Line platform.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#74 Fullerton

# Halsted

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
